48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: A man from Banu Sulaim narrated:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) counted them out in my hand” - or - “in his hand: ‘At-Tasbīḥ is half of the Scale, and “All praise is due to Allah (Al-Ḥamdulillāh)” fills it, and At-Takbīr (Allāhu Akbar) fills what is between the sky and the earth, and fasting is half of patience, and purification is half of faith.”

chapter.eng-name: Containing Two Hadith, “At-Tasbih is Half of the Scale...”
